name: distribution-not-selected
description: Choose a distribution by running 'npm run set-dist <plugin-template>' followed by 'npm run apply'.
changes: changes to this file can be commited with the --no-verify option

scripts.postinstall: npm run apply && echo && npm run which-dist && echo
scripts.start: echo && echo "Choose a distribution by running 'npm run set-dist <plugin-template>' followed by 'npm run apply'." && echo
scripts.apply: npm i fs-extra@0.30 && cd plugin-template && node apply.js $(cat ../.plugin-dist) && cd .. && npm i
